Body:
"""
    Basic functionality of `fit_xrf_map`.
    Tests are run using global Dask clients to inprove testing speed.
    """
dataset_params = {'n_data_dimensions': (20, 20)}
add_pts_before, add_pts_after = 15, 10
use_snip = False
ft = _FitXRFMapTesting(dataset_params=dataset_params, use_snip=use_snip,
    add_pts_before=add_pts_before, add_pts_after=add_pts_after)
data = ft.data_input
data_out = fit_xrf_map(data, data_sel_indices=ft.data_sel_indices, matv=ft.
    spectra, snip_param=ft.snip_param, use_snip=use_snip, chunk_pixels=10,
    n_chunks_min=4, progress_bar=None, client=None)
ft.verify_fit_output(data_out=data_out, snip_param=ft.snip_param)
